examples.example: 对不起，我没听清楚，请你再说一遍可以吗？

translate.english: Sorry, I didn't hear clearly. Could you say it again, please?

examples.example: 老师耐心地对小明说：“刚才的重点我再说一遍，你可要认真听呀。”

translate.english: The teacher said to Xiaoming patiently, "I will repeat the key points just now. You must listen carefully."

examples.example: 有些复杂的问题没听明白时，我会礼貌地请对方再说一遍。

translate.english: When some complicated questions are not understood clearly, I will politely ask the other party to say it again.
